blogPost.excerpt: Remove objects from a video in less than 2 min using AI. ✂️ Remove dynamic objects, peoples, watermarks ✨ Add filters, turn your video into photos, GIF, audios 👋 Publish it in one click to seven platforms 🔎 Smart library to store your clips ✅ Try it for free
blogPost.body: Remove objects from a video in less than 2 min using AI. ✂️ Remove dynamic objects, peoples, watermarks ✨ Add filters, turn your video into photos, GIF, audios 👋 Publish it in one click to seven platforms 🔎 Smart library to store your clips ✅ Try it for free
blogPost.title: Evanesco - Free AI-Powered Dynamic Object Remover for Creators
blogPost.author: Thomas

localize.description: 使用人工智能在2分钟内从视频中删除对象。✂️删除动态对象、人物、水印 ✨添加滤镜，将你的视频变成照片、GIF、音频 👋一键发布到七大平台 🔎智能库存储你的剪辑 ✅免费试一下吧
localize.tagline: 为创造者提供免费的人工智能动态对象清除器。

localize.description: 使用人工智能在2分鐘內從視頻中刪除對象。✂️刪除動態對象、人物、水印 ✨添加濾鏡，將你的視頻變成照片、GIF、音頻 👋一鍵發佈到七大平臺 🔎智能庫存儲你的剪輯 ✅免費試一下吧
localize.tagline: 爲創造者提供免費的人工智能動態對象清除器。

previous.excerpt: SwifLink provides microsite services to allow our users to have the freedom to let their creativity speak by fully personalizing the look and feel of their page while having the possibility to embed and list multiple links in only one link.
previous.title: SwifLink - Sleek microsite and URL shortener - fully user customisable

localize.description: SwifLink提供的微型网站服务，让我们的用户可以自由地让他们的创造力说话，完全个性化他们的页面的外观和感觉，同时有可能在一个链接中嵌入和列出多个链接。
localize.tagline: 精巧的微型网站和URL缩短器--完全可由用户自定义。

localize.description: SwifLink提供的微型網站服務，讓我們的用戶可以自由地讓他們的創造力說話，完全個性化他們的頁面的外觀和感覺，同時有可能在一個鏈接中嵌入和列出多個鏈接。
localize.tagline: 精巧的微型網站和URL縮短器--完全可由用戶自定義。

next.excerpt: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!
next.title: Alinea - Invest in stocks you believe in

localize.description: Alinea是一款面向下一代的移动投资应用。我们根据您的兴趣为您匹配股票，并提供比特大小的见解，让您可以投资您相信的公司。加入候补名单，预约名额!
Alinea是一款面向下一代的移動投資應用。我們根據您的興趣爲您匹配股票，並提供比特大小的見解，讓您可以投資您相信的公司。加入候補名單，預約名額!
